snippet.title: Legrand Legacy | Teaser Trailer 2017
snippet.description:
LEGRAND LEGACY is a love letter to all-time favorite JRPGs with a fresh take on the classic turn-based combat. Explore a beautifully hand-drawn world riddled with fantastical creatures, devastating wars, and intriguing stories of personal redemption. Play our demo and discover why Legrand Legacy is the "Most Promising Game" of the year!

For more information please visit:
Play the Demo | http://store.steampowered.com/app/556740/LEGRAND_LEGACY/
Website | http://legrandlegacy.com/
Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/legrandlegacy/
Twitter | https://twitter.com/LegrandLegacy
